title: A spectroscopy-based proof-of-concept (POC) for developing loading of pathogen analyzer (LOPA) for dairy products
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Lopamudra Roy, Amrita Banerjee, Nivedita Pan, Ria Ghosh, Susmita Mondal, Monojit Das, Md Nur Hasan, Soumendra Singh, Arpita Chattopadhyay, Kallol Bhattacharyya, Soumen Mondal, Samir Kumar Pal
